Message:
Heh-heh! I’ve already gained
this much power...!

To learn such
ancient arts so easily,
I tremble before
my own talent...!

Though, this is naught but
the fate of one such as I.

“O incantation of
the frigid wintry winds...!
Become an unbreakable wish
upon this night...!”

The room was suddenly
enveloped by the very winds
I had wrought.

Heh...! I really am
the Holy Overlord’s chosen,
ah...ah-choo!

Ugh, it’s colder
than I thought...
This oughta do it...
O frigid winds, begone...!
Or, not...?

Whoa, whoa, wawawa...!
At this rate,
the whole mansion
will turn into a popsicle~...!

Wait... It stopped...?
Someone must’ve
helped me out, I bet.

Th-That’s a relief... But, this means
I’m all set to go! Tonight’s finally
the Holy Night, too.

I’m sure I just lost control
for a second ’cause my
magic’s gotten so powerful...

But, it’s no big deal! It’ll all
work out fine, I just know it!

Alright! It’s almost
our meeting time,
so I should probably
go and find Boss...!
“Heeey! Stella, over here!”

Oh, it’s Master Merlyn!
Long time no see~!

“Master~! I’ve learned the secret
of the Holy Miracle!
If it snows at night,
the Holy Overlord will...

Huh? You learned
the secret too, Master?”

“‘Confess your love under the
large tree in the town square.
Then, the love you seek
will be yours.’

...So that’s the
Holy Night’s miracle, eh?
Mmhm, mmhm, I see...
Confess, huh? Con...”
“CONFWESSH...?!”
